text: "If You Needed Somebody" is a song by Bad Company. It was released in 1990 as a single from their album Holy Water. The song is the band's first top 40 hit since 1979's "Rock 'n' Roll Fantasy", peaking at No. 16 on the Billboard Hot 100. ==Chart performance== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Chart (1991) !
